_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ForecastRevision.description: A document used to revise a Forecast.

ForecastRevision.title: Forecast Revision. Details
ForecastRevision.description: A document used to revise a Forecast.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Forecast Revision. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Forecast Revision. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Forecast Revision. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Forecast Revision. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Forecast Revision. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Forecast Revision. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Forecast Revision. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Forecast Revision. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Forecast Revision. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Forecast Revision. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

SequenceNumberID.title: Forecast Revision. Sequence Number. Identifier
SequenceNumberID.description: A sequence number, to ensure the proper sequencing of revisions.

RevisionStatusCode.title: Forecast Revision. Revision_ Status Code. Code
RevisionStatusCode.description: Indicates the revision status of this Forecast Revision.

PurposeCode.title: Forecast Revision. Purpose Code. Code
PurposeCode.description: Indicates the purpose of the revision.

ForecastPeriod.title: Forecast Revision. Forecast_ Period. Period
ForecastPeriod.description: The period to which the Forecast applies.

OriginalDocumentReference.title: Forecast Revision. Original_ Document Reference. Document Reference

Signature.title: Forecast Revision. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Forecast Revision. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Forecast Revision. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

ForecastRevisionLine.title: Forecast Revision. Forecast Revision Line
ForecastRevisionLine.description: A line that revises a line in the Forecast.
